roleset.name: mentally unstable
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Relation to sane.01

example.name: arg1-person
example.text: And the one guy that does try to send people for then gets put away as *PRO* being insane

example.name: concatenated rel
example.text: He was insane to have demanded her as his personal assistant.
example.arg: [he][to have demanded her as his personal assistant]
